content.question: If <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is the function defined by <math alttext="f of x equals, the fourth root of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mroot><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, what is <math alttext="f prime of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="one fourth times x raised to the one fourth power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x raised to the negative three fourths power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="one fourth times x raised to the negative three fourths power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="4 times the cube root of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>⋅</mo><mroot><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mroot></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one fourth times x raised to the negative three fourths power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
